entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries along the coast. Local amount 2 cm along the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 except minus 14 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4 except minus 14 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Windy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 19 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 19 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 20 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 20 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
